_header: An eagle shall rise with a boar bold
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 146.
_description: A political prophecy — forty-five irregular rhyming lines

BLLan762.First Lines: An Egyll shall ryse with a bore bold…
